channel.title: alex on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in alex on Barefoot Rob

item.title: planted some mini Alexii
item.description:
18:08 Wednesday 31 July 2019 JST Today the weather was quite lovely, so I spent some time outside repotting some baby plants that had come from Alex, who froze two winters ago. The original Alex can be seen in the first two pics here.
20:12 Wednesday 31 July 2019 JST I just got super sidetracked looking for Alex pictures, after finding a journal entry with a missing image of Alex.

item.title: Alex progeny
item.description:
11:58 Saturday 16 September 2017 JST I put this leaf down but before it could grow much past the pics shown here, it got cleaned up by the annual clearing done by city workers.
After the annual clear cut seemed to be complete, I found a spot that had not been cleared. It is still in the same park, but on a sidewalk, so maybe it will be clearcut by a different team.

item.title: kalanchoe tomentosa are so easy to grow
item.description: 00:07 Tuesday 24 January 2017 JST Some leaves fell off Alex, the first plant Lin and I got. I stuck them into some soil and they’ve started to grow.

item.title: macrame for Alex yesterday
item.description: written 16:43 Monday 13 June 2016 JST Yesterday I made a hanger for Alex, whose plastic hanger broke. I broke in to my old macare (that aint right, but that’s the word that came to mind and I had to look this one up:) macrame weaving skills and went to work with 4 sets of earphones that Lin and I got from our flights to the US in January. Boom!

item.title: Alex outside
item.description: (written 09:59 Friday 07 November 2014 JST) Photo taken 30 October 2014
